name: Kenny Greg
text: I just recently, not even 15 mins, left the store to buy pipe tobacco. It’s a relatively cooler and rainy day here in Birmingham Al, with a hurricane coming this way, I decide to wear my hoodie to stay dry. I’ve walked into many different establishments before entering this one wearing my rain gear. Not one person disrespected me or treated me like I was insane for wearing things to keep the rain and cold off of me. When I finally entered the Standish meant, one of the persons within the store, was very helpful and considerate and help me find the products that I need. They treated me like a human and respected me. I thanked them for their help several times. When I went to check out was when everything changed. I was scolded for wearing a hoodie and not seeing a sign that says no hoodies by a gentleman and a blonde old lady. Granted if I had seen the sign, it would’ve told me right away what it truly means: No PoC. I wouldn’t have walked in and took my business elsewhere. This store is in a predominately PoC neighborhood and they band people from wearing hoodies, even on rainy days. That should tell you the type of people they dont want to enter their store, even though they are surrounded by nothing but PoC. I even went back inside and said how rude it is to treat people that way. I even bought stuff with my Navy Fed card, and they showed no respect, and talked down to me like I was a second rate citizen. I never been so humiliated for just trying to stay dry. Seriously I thought we got passed this when Trayvon Martin died but it’s Birmingham so I’m not surprised.

resp.text: Sorry you felt that way. Well if you come in to the shop you need to pull your hoody of your head. It’s for security purposes.

name: Dalten Martin
text: I was sold a vape pen from the display so that I could get the color I wanted (Thank you kind Woman) but once I got home, the button fell off. Oh well, that’s an honest mistake. I went back the next day and the same woman was working. I explained what happened and she took a look and quickly and without question replaced my pen. I get home, everything works fine, I go to charge said new pen, and voila, it won’t charge, the charge port is pushed up a bit and the charging light won’t charge. I felt bad about returning but I was impressed with the customer service. I went back, a man was working, I explained what happened and that I’d been here two days prior with similar issues. He told me the pen wasn’t working and it was my fault and there was nothing he could do. I asked for a replacement and he denied me and kept telling me it was my fault the pen was not working. He was short and rather rude with me and I won’t be purchasing anything else from him.

text: The customer service event was amazing ! Amazing food! great products ! great prices! I normally shop at the Airport location and the sweet cashier  named Victoria invited me to this and it was amazing I can't believe they love their customers so much as to give out some much amazing stuff! I believe you should always support your local businesses and this one truly deserves it they care and really want to help you find what you need and are so honest! And the owner Kim is just so sweet! Everyone there is really ! the guy at the door Dane was also so funny!

text: Just passing through and decided to pick up a few supplies. The woman working  very helpful. I was able to find everything that I needed all in one shop. Normally I would have to go to 2 or 3 places just to get what I was looking for.  I would definitely recommend this shop to anyone. Thanks so much.

name: Don Morgan
text:
I stopped by this store while traveling in Mobile.
Staff was amazingly friendly, store was impeccably clean and such an amazing selection.. they had all I was looking for in a one stop shopping experience!
I’ll definitely be revisiting this store again when back in town...

name: KIm
text: I travel a lot and always stop in adult stores when I’m on the road. I must say that this is one of my favorites to stop by! It is so big, well lit,  has a ton of Lingerie Including a huge selection of plus size — bigger than I’ve seen anywhere else. The toy selection second to none and the employees are super sweet and helpful!  Can’t wait to visit again.

name: Jeri Scroggins
text: Only place i go for my needs! Always a fun experience! All employees are friendly and knowledgable! And Carolyn is amazing! I appreciate them all and they give excellent customer service! The "other" adult stores i have found to be rude, bitter employees and very over priced products!! NT the only place for me!

resp.text: Thank you so much!  We strive to be the best we can every day!  Come see us again soon - we are adding new items weekly!

name: Steven Snipes
text: Be careful folks!  I purchased a set of their Brown  batteries from their Schillinger Rd store and on the side of the battery itself it had CAUTION!  Using these batteries in any E-Cigarette devices is STRICTLY PROHIBITED!  And the owner of these stores knows this now but refuses to remove them from his stores.  Folks if you are using these type of batteries be EXTREMELY CAREFUL!  These type of batteries could possibly blow up in your hand near your face.

name: Elizabeth Cochran
text: My friends just spent $38 on tequila that shouldve been $25. Make sure they don’t cheat you!!

resp.text:
Dear valued customer,

We are very sorry for the confusion and the inconvenience we may have caused.

We double checked the price before and after sales. The 750ml bottle of Hornitos Plata you bought is priced at $37.99 and it is nowhere in the shelf implied otherwise.

In any case of mistaken overcharge, or under circumstances where our products don’t meet the expectations, we have in the past and will continue to offer refunds for our customers' 100% satisfaction. It does not appear to be so in this case. We are more than happy to clarify the issue, if you visit our store.

Again, please accept our apology.

Sunny’s Mgmt.
